buildCommand: curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.3-stable.tar.xz | tar -xJ -C /tmp && export PATH="/tmp/flutter/bin:$PATH" && git config --global --add safe.directory /tmp/flutter && flutter config --enable-web --no-analytics && flutter --version && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release
